      • getInstance

        public static Java5TransactionLocker getInstance()

      • acquire

        public KeyValuePair<java.lang.String,java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock> acquire(java.lang.String key)
        Acquire a reentrant lock associating with a key. DO NOT forget release the lock by invoking release().
        参数:
        key - The key to uniquely identify a lock.
        返回:
        a reentrant lock.

      • release

        public void release(KeyValuePair<java.lang.String,java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock> transLockMap)
